definition: to lose output/a drop in crop yield/reduction in production
to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish

sentences.english: Each year ten percent of the crop is lost to a pest called corn rootworm.
sentences.chinese: 一種叫玉米根蟲的害蟲每年會讓糧食減產10%。

sentences.english: Excessive amount of DPC reduced the yield of CRI 23three-day before first watering.
sentences.chinese: 中棉所23號一水前化控的量大會減產。

sentences.english: Sporadic protests have broken out as some factories close or cut production.
sentences.chinese: 由於工廠倒閉或減產，偶爾會發生一些抗議活動。

sentences.english: Sixty percent have been lost in Alberta, and 40 percent are gone in British Columbia, Wells said.
sentences.chinese: 六成損失在亞伯達，4成在英屬哥倫比亞省減產。

sentences.english: This year, honey production in China has decreased sharply due to climate abnormities.
sentences.chinese: 今年由於氣候異常，我國蜂蜜嚴重減產。

sentences.english: Across the world carmakers are mothballing factories and dropping shifts.
sentences.chinese: 全世界的汽車工廠都面臨停產或減產。

sentences.english: High risk regions of moderate and severe output reduction were same located in the Changbai Mountain areas.
sentences.chinese: 嚴重減產年出現的概率高值區主要位於長白山地區。

sentences.english: The discount on heavier crudes has risen to record levels.
sentences.chinese: 重油的減產額度達到了歷史新高。

sentences.english: Rice bacterial blight and Rice blast are the most important rice disease.
sentences.chinese: 水稻病害的侵染會導致減產甚至絕收。

sentences.english: As the global economy collapsed, those firms slashed production capacity, she says.
sentences.chinese: 麥森紐說，隨着全球經濟的崩潰，這些企業大幅減產。

sentences.english: Saudi Oil Minister Ali al - Naimi said no cut will be made before next month.
sentences.chinese: 原油部長A指出下個月前將不會有任何減產決定。

sentences.english: Khelil said ministers hadn't discussed a cut in output during the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 克利勒說，部長們在會議中沒有就減產進行討論。

sentences.english: We are not looking at retrenchments for as long as circumstances allow.
sentences.chinese: 只要環境允許我們不會減產。

sentences.english: Subsequently, the problem of underproduction will arise.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，減產問題就會出現。

definition: to adjust downwards/to lower (prices, wages etc)
to demote/to pass down to a lower unit
property or cash held in reserve/stock
to slow/to slow down (the pace of)
